description: Defines an Android activity class 'PrivacyNoticeActivity' that displays a privacy notice screen with toolbar and scrollable text content.

classes.name: PrivacyNoticeActivity
classes.description: An Android activity displaying a privacy notice with toolbar and content text.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets layout, toolbar, back navigation, and populates text content.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the options menu for the activity.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item clicks, including launching SettingsActivity.
